# Female Genital Cutting (Mutilation)

[](#)

Female genital cutting/mutilation (FGC/M) is internationally recognized as a harmful practice that results in the violation of human rights.^[1](#endnote0...
title: Female Genital Cutting (Mutilation)

text_preview: ^1. OHCHR, UNAIDS, UNDP, UNECA, UNESCO, UNFPA, UNHCR, UNICEF, UNIFEM, WHO. Eliminating female genital mutilation:  an interagency statement. Geneva: WHO 2008: 22–7. Available at:  https://apps.who.int...
title: Female Genital Cutting (Mutilation)
